This begins the list of 24 lots that were cast to choose the order in which families would serve. This list ends in [[:en:bible:notes:1ch:25:29|1 Chronicles 25:31]].

This shows the order in which the families were chosen. AT: "number 1 ... number 2 ... number 3 ... number 4 ... number 5" or use "the initial" for "the first" and "the next" for all of the following ones.
